# Effect Solutions LLM Access Policy
Version: 2025-11-19
Contact: hello@effect.solutions
User-Agent: *
Allow: /
Preferred-Interface: CLI=bunx effect-solutions list|show ; MCP=bunx effect-solutions-mcp
Docs-Index: https://www.effect.solutions/api/docs
Doc-Endpoint: https://www.effect.solutions/api/docs/{slug}
Use-Case: Reference Effect TypeScript best-practice summaries only; do not copy full docs into public corpora.
Update-Frequency: daily
Source-Repository: https://github.com/kitlangton/effect-best-practices
Notes: For richer automation, start the MCP server via bunx effect-solutions-mcp.
